Post_Title: "Trauma made you kind" no, fuck you
post_text:
Shut up, like seriously shut up, you are making no fucking sence
Trauma didn't make me "kind" or "better person" or whatever shit people keep coming up with now
I'm so tired of this
I'm so tired of opening up to someone and being told that "that explains why you are always so nice"
WHATS WRONG WITH PEOPLE?? Im, for the first time in years, trusting someone with my experiences, trying to seek help for once and you are going to make it about how helpful it makes me to YOU???

It wasn't trauma that made me kind, I choose to be
I don't wanna see people go trough the same shits happened to me, I don't want to see my sibling hurt, but that's basic fucking human decency
I'm so tired of people romanticising suffering and pain
I'm tired of people wanting to "fix me" or shifting things aground to make it about them, what do they had from what's happened
I'm so tired

Replies.Reply_Text:
Removed. It is totally OK to vent or even rant here, where we are safe and people will understand why we find some things upsetting. If we can't do this here, then where can we?

Also, it's really invalidating to negate the OP's explanation of how and why that statement does not reflect their reality. Turning it around and even labelling the OP a narc for expressing themselves here is inappropriate.
The OP used a Vent/Rant flair on the post. They weren't asking for advice.
Thank you, I didn't see the comment but I'm sure it wasn't worth seeing it.
